sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:bsvc="urn:com.workday/bsvc"> <soapenv:Header> <bsvc:Workday_Common_Header> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Include_Reference_Descriptors_In_Response>${Workday_Common_Header.Include_Reference_Descriptors_In_Response}</bsvc:Include_Reference_Descriptors_In_Response> </bsvc:Workday_Common_Header> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <bsvc:Workday_Account_for_Worker_Update bsvc:version="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Update}"> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Worker_Reference> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <bsvc:Employee_Reference> <bsvc:Integration_ID_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Employee_Reference.Integration_ID_Reference}"> <bsvc:ID bsvc:System_ID="${Integration_ID_Reference.ID}">${Integration_ID_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Integration_ID_Reference> </bsvc:Employee_Reference> <bsvc:Contingent_Worker_Reference> <bsvc:Integration_ID_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Contingent_Worker_Reference.Integration_ID_Reference}"> <bsvc:ID bsvc:System_ID="${Integration_ID_Reference.ID}">${Integration_ID_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Integration_ID_Reference> </bsvc:Contingent_Worker_Reference> </bsvc:Worker_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Non_Worker_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Update.Non_Worker_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Non_Worker_Reference.ID}">${Non_Worker_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Non_Worker_Reference> <bsvc:Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data> <bsvc:User_Name>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.User_Name}</bsvc:User_Name> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Password>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Password}</bsvc:Password> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Generate_Random_Password>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Generate_Random_Password}</bsvc:Generate_Random_Password> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Require_New_Password_at_Next_Sign_In>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Require_New_Password_at_Next_Sign_In}</bsvc:Require_New_Password_at_Next_Sign_In> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:One-Time_Passcode_Exempt>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.One-Time_Passcode_Exempt}</bsvc:One-Time_Passcode_Exempt> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Enabled>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Enabled}</bsvc:One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Enabled> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Login_Remaining_Count>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Login_Remaining_Count}</bsvc:One-Time_Passcode_Grace_Period_Login_Remaining_Count> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Account_Disabled>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Account_Disabled}</bsvc:Account_Disabled> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Account_Expiration_Date>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Account_Expiration_Date}</bsvc:Account_Expiration_Date> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:OpenID_Identifier>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.OpenID_Identifier}</bsvc:OpenID_Identifier> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:OpenID_Internal_Identifier>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.OpenID_Internal_Identifier}</bsvc:OpenID_Internal_Identifier> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:OpenID_Connect_Internal_Identifier>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.OpenID_Connect_Internal_Identifier}</bsvc:OpenID_Connect_Internal_Identifier> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference.ID}">${Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Delegated_Authentication_Integration_System_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Session_Timeout_Minutes>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Session_Timeout_Minutes}</bsvc:Session_Timeout_Minutes> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Show_User_Name_in_Browser_Window>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Show_User_Name_in_Browser_Window}</bsvc:Show_User_Name_in_Browser_Window> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Display_XML_Icon_on_Reports>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Display_XML_Icon_on_Reports}</bsvc:Display_XML_Icon_on_Reports> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Enable_Workbox>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Enable_Workbox}</bsvc:Enable_Workbox> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Locale_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Locale_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Locale_Reference.ID}">${Locale_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Locale_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:User_Language_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.User_Language_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${User_Language_Reference.ID}">${User_Language_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:User_Language_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Preferred_Communication_Language_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Preferred_Communication_Language_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Preferred_Communication_Language_Reference.ID}">${Preferred_Communication_Language_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Preferred_Communication_Language_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference.ID}">${Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Preferred_Search_Scope_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Allow_Mixed-Language_Transactions>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Allow_Mixed-Language_Transactions}</bsvc:Allow_Mixed-Language_Transactions> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:Notification_Sub_Type_Configurations> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:Notification_Sub_Type_Configuration> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Notification_Sub_Type_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Notification_Sub_Type_Configuration.Notification_Sub_Type_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Notification_Sub_Type_Reference.ID}">${Notification_Sub_Type_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Notification_Sub_Type_Reference> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:Notification_channels_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Notification_Sub_Type_Configuration.Notification_channels_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Notification_channels_Reference.ID}">${Notification_channels_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Notification_channels_Reference> </bsvc:Notification_Sub_Type_Configuration> </bsvc:Notification_Sub_Type_Configurations> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Exempt_from_Delegated_Authentication>${Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data.Exempt_from_Delegated_Authentication}</bsvc:Exempt_from_Delegated_Authentication> </bsvc:Workday_Account_for_Worker_Data> </bsvc:Workday_Account_for_Worker_Update> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
